original_text: It was just before the Passover Festival. Jesus knew that the hour had come for him to leave this world and go to the Father. Having loved his own who were in the world, he loved them to the end.
korean_text: 유월절 전에 예수께서 자기가 세상을 떠나 아버지께로 돌아가실 때가 이른 줄 아시고 세상에 있는 자기 사람들을 사랑하시되 끝까지 사랑하시니라

sentences.original_text: It was just before the Passover Festival.
Jesus knew that hour had come
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그 때가 왔다는 것을 아셨습니다

sentences.original_text: for him to leave this world
he loved them to the end.
